eu.tivian.musico

Class SharedViewModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
      • eu.tivian.musico.SharedViewModel

  • public class SharedViewModel
extends ViewModel
    ViewModel for data which is used between different UI elements.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private MutableLiveData<AlbumCursor> cursor
      The album list cursor.
      private MutableLiveData<Float> fabAlpha
      An alpha value of the FloatingActionButton on the album list screen.
      private MutableLiveData<Integer> language
      Current language of the app.
      private MutableLiveData<Map<String,Object>> stats
      The list of the various statistics used in StatisticsFragment.
      private MutableLiveData<String> username
      The Last.fm username.
